entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Sprague
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:20 a.m. CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning late this afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 4.
